extension.news: [COLOR lavender][B]Manage Kodi Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]2.1:[/B] - Bug FIx: Ignore Cache files of thumbs [B]2.0:[/B] - Initial Public release - Add ability to add Prefixes, Suffixes and Colors and/or Insert/Swap items in Favourites. - Add ability to "Sort" all items in Favourites. - Supersedes the Insert/Swap Kodi Favourites Program Addon
extension.description:
Lets you manage the entries in your [B]Favourites[/B] by either inserting/swapping/sorting entries and/or adding a "prefix/suffix" with "coloring".
Kodi Program Addon to graphically manage your Kodi favourites by sorting, inserting, or swapping items and/or adding a prefix, suffix and color to you Kodi favourites Select item "A" and modify the Prefix/Suffix and Colors or simply select "A" then "B" and move depending the on the Insert/Swap mode set in the configuration panel.
Use the "Sort" button to quickly alphabetize your Favourites.
Use this to quickly and easily manage your Kodi Favourites.
